Major update for livecounter.theyosh.nl

Submitted by theyosh on Wed, 04/22/2015 - 16:02

The last month, the livecounter.theyosh.nl website had a busy period. Almost every day we reached 900+ requests per second. That is about 30.000+ users that is seeing the counter. The problem that arises is that there not enough upload bandwidth. We have updated the livecounter under the hood, in such a way, that we can not handle 40.000+ users!! That is an increase of 33%!

  • Read more about Major update for livecounter.theyosh.nl
  • 10346 views
Story type
livecounter
Server
AJAX

Dreambox ReStream update 2.3.7

Submitted by theyosh on Wed, 04/22/2015 - 15:48

After almost 7 months there is a new update of Dreambox ReStream software. Due to the fact that we are currently happy with the software, the amount of updates is low. We think there is no need for updates except for bugs and or security related issues. If there are still wishes, please mail them to: dreambox [at] theyosh.nl
